item.title: Best restaurants in Florida? 17 fun, local spots worth the drive
item.description: Forget the chainsduring your next road trip. Florida is home tosome of the finest restaurants in the country— and also some of the funkiest, funniest, and flat-out most unforgettable.

item.title: Trump wants Sarasota politician to run Republican National Committee

item.title: DeSantis's Ringling Museum plan scares off donors, threatening $750K.
item.description: When Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis proposedtransferring The John and Mable Ringling Museum of Artfrom Florida State University to New College of Florida earlier this year, museum supporters warned the move would scare away donors.
